name: 王多柏
objective:
MOS Field-Effect Transistors (MOSFETs)
Building Blocks of Integrated Circuit Amplifiers
Differential and Mulitstage Amplifiers
schedule:
Topics:
Ch5 MOS Field-Effect Transistors (MOSFETs)
Ch6 Building Blocks of Integrated Circuit Amplifiers
Ch7 Differential and Mulitstage Amplifiers
scorePolicy:
Homework and Tests (Quiz, Pop Quiz, ...): 30% 
Midterm: 30% 
Final Exam: 30%
Class Participation: 10%
materials:
Textbook:
1. 自編講義
2. Microelectronic Circuits, 8th edition. Sedra/Smith.
consultation: 課堂上會提供問題諮詢與解惑
remarks: 期末考週_6 月 4 日 (二)_不上課，請自行溫書期末考_6 月 6 日 (四)_原上課教室 (10am 先在走廊等候，重新排座位)。範圍_MOSET (p24) 到 5 月 30 日內容。第 17~18 週_實施遠距教學，使用 microsoft reams (學校已經幫有修課學生建好群組)。
